products.title: Konya Blackout Sloe Purple
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout sloe purple roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackout sloe purpleplain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Dark Purple - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), dark purple - roller blind the origin (blackout) in dark purple is just that - a high quality, fabric blind that keeps outside light at bay, in a dark, contemporary purple shade. Its sleek, smooth material makes it easy to roll up and d
products.productdescription: The origin (blackout) in dark purple is just that - a high quality, fabric blind that keeps outside light at bay, in a dark, contemporary purple shade. Its sleek, smooth material makes it easy to roll up and down, and is lightweight yet durable to suit plenty of use. To create a moody yet modern look in a bedroom, pair with white walls and dark woods, or with beige neutrals and rich creams for something a little more luxurious. This is also the perfect colour to add to an upstairs hallway or a white utility room.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription:
The deep purple tone here is one of warmth, its a stylish colour somewhere between dark blackcurrant and lighter grape, it has depth but isnt too vibrant or loud.    
This blackout roller blind will add a sophisticated note to a bedroom or maybe a cosy look in a bathroom.

products.title: Dark Purple (4561) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure dark purple (4561) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
